content: there is a snowboard version après snowboard cozy hat 1 incase you re one of those smiley download will include both versions because nothing says i conquered the slopes like a cozy knitted ski hat perfect for those who ski like pros… or at least look like they do from a distance + media title 2 the pattern knits a big baggy cozy hat the original was made for a friend but after i made myself my own i liked it so much the hat can be made with regular stranded knitting or ladderback jackard the latter gives great results for high contrast colours but requires a bit more work i have included a plain chart and a chart detailing the ladderback jackard stitches if you re unsure about ladderback jackard this video is the best i ve seen for detailing the technique https //youtu be/iltugy_m-ds si=uxjr_8ctsd7hff0w 3 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/apres-snowboard-cozy-hat 2 https //youtu be/nt11cqbgx74 3 https //youtu be/iltugy_m-ds si=uxjr_8ctsd7hff0w
